title: Automation.com - All Industrial Automation News and Products

items.title: Case Study: Heritage Petroleum Company Upgrades SCADA System With Skkynet Software
How Mini-Load and Pallet-Load ASRS Are Reshaping Warehouse Efficiency
PI opens Shrewsbury U.S. factory to bolster support
items.summary:
- PI will open a 140,000‑sq‑ft Shrewsbury facility in November 2025, tripling its U.S. footprint to *localize production* and reduce exposure to import tariffs.
- Manufacturing will include **nanopositioning**, piezo transducers, air bearings and automation to shorten lead times and improve North American customer support.
- The plant will create high‑quality engineering jobs and act as a hub for innovation across *photonics*, semiconductors, aerospace and life sciences.

items.title: ANCA Names Christopher Weaver Group CFO
items.summary:
- ANCA appoints *Christopher Weaver* as **Group CFO**, signaling renewed focus on *strategic investment* and financial leadership.
- Weaver brings 25+ years across engineering, manufacturing and finance, with experience in *M&A*, ERP and global expansion to support ANCA's growth.
- His hire coincides with the retirement of long-serving CFO Gary Ward and underscores ANCA’s push into *AI integration* and next-generation *CNC manufacturing*.

items.title: E Tech Group Renames Recently Acquired JSat Automation
items.summary:
- E Tech Group *renamed* the recently acquired JSat Automation to operate under the **E Tech Group** brand after completing the acquisition on May 28, 2025.
- The move expands E Tech Group’s **global footprint** with 10 additional locations (US, Costa Rica, India, Netherlands, Romania, Singapore, Switzerland, UK) and adds capabilities like *LAIR*, *GMP* consulting and multisite MES.
- Leadership says the change ensures seamless continuity for clients, strengthens its role as **Main Automation Partner**, and creates new opportunities for employees.

items.title: EDM Association Acquires Assets of Object Management Group, Creating World’s Largest Data and Standards Community
Coriolis Flowmeters Continue to Dominate the Worldwide Flowmeter Market
Greg Jones Named President, Industrial Americas (Trelleborg)
items.summary:
- Gregory Jones, a nearly 30-year Trelleborg veteran, is named business unit president for *Industrial Americas* at *Trelleborg Sealing Solutions*.
- He previously led global sales for Aerospace, drove M&A integrations, and will prioritize *segment-specific engineered solutions* and stronger client partnerships.
- He succeeds Heather Martin (now VP, Global Market Strategy & Development, Trelleborg Medical Solutions) and aims to drive *sustainable growth* through innovation and collaboration.

items.title: Bosch Unites Its Building Technologies Brands
ABB Acquires BrightLoop to Scale Electrification
items.summary:
- ABB completed acquisition of *BrightLoop*, taking a **93%** controlling stake (remaining 7% expected by 2028) to accelerate *electrification* across mining, off‑highway and marine sectors.
- *BrightLoop*, a Paris-based pioneer of high-performance **DC/DC converters** used in Formula E, brings compact, efficient power electronics now applied to construction, marine, aerospace, hydrogen and defense.
- The deal (financial terms undisclosed) adds ~90 employees and strengthens ABB’s ability to scale cleaner, smarter propulsion and industrial mobility solutions globally.

items.title: Take Proactive Steps to Ensure Supply Chain Cybersecurity
items.author: Daniele Mancini
items.summary:
- The World Economic Forum shows supply chain challenges are the main obstacle to cyber resilience for *54%* of large firms, with *98%* reporting breaches, driving ecosystem-wide risk orchestration.
- Six drivers—*geopolitical tensions*, *AI/tech risks*, *regulatory proliferation*, *supply interdependencies*, *cybercrime*, and the *skills gap*—demand proactive governance and AI-powered monitoring.
- Models include **Centralized**, **Blended**, and **Standards-oriented** integration; plus *zero-trust*, continuous data collection, and post-quantum readiness planning.

items.title: Study: 65% Now Use AI, But Majority Remain Untrained on Risks
Securing Manufacturing Lines From the Inside Out
E Tech Group Renames Acquired JSat Automation
items.summary:
- E Tech Group has renamed the recently acquired *JSat Automation* to **E Tech Group**, unifying brands after the May 28, 2025 acquisition while honoring all existing client commitments.
- The deal expands the firm's global footprint to 10 locations across several countries and adds *LAIR* (Lab Automation and Industrial Robotics), *GMP* consulting and multisite *MES* capabilities.
- Leadership says the integration will be seamless for clients and will deliver greater scale, innovation and employee opportunities.

items.title: Cryogenic Precision: Measuring Nitrogen Flow With Coriolis Mass Flow Meters
IFS Appoints Mihita Podobnik as Chief People Officer
items.summary:
- IFS has appointed *Mihita Podobnik* as **Chief People Officer**, succeeding Debra McCowan.  
- Podobnik, previously IFS *Chief of Staff*, will lead the company’s people‑first agenda to support global scaling and strategic initiatives.  
- She highlights *talent* as the key enabler amid accelerating *AI* disruption, endorsed by CEO Mark Moffat’s praise for her strategic leadership.

items.title: Kyle Chapman Named Barry-Wehmiller CEO While Bob Chapman Continues to Serve as Chairman of the Board
ABB launches mill‑wide optimizer for pulp mills
items.summary:
- ABB launched *Plant Optimizer for Pulp Mills*, a mill‑wide software that unifies planning and real‑time operations to improve *traceability* and cut production costs.  
- The solution delivers *economic optimization*, dynamic scenario modeling and automated set‑points to boost throughput and reduce waste.  
- It strengthens *operational resilience*, helping mills adapt to disruptions, skills gaps and the energy transition.

items.title: Valmet QCS Upgrade for Metsä Tissue Mariestad Mill
items.summary:
- Valmet will deliver its *Valmet IQ* Quality Control System (QCS) with scanner-based basis weight, moisture and softness measurements to *Metsä Tissue*'s *PM 35* in Mariestad to improve product quality and simplify operations.
- The delivery includes mechanical installation, sheet transfer modification, integration with the distributed control system, and a service agreement for *predictive maintenance* and 24/7 support to ensure smooth start-up and reliable operation.
- The order strengthens the long-standing cooperation between *Valmet* and *Metsä Tissue*, was booked in Valmet's Q3 2025 orders, and the value was not disclosed.

items.title: Salt River Project Completes Hydropower Modernization
items.summary:
- SRP completed a multi-year modernization of four hydro dams (Roosevelt, Horse Mesa, Mormon Flat, Stewart Mountain), integrating *Emerson*'s **Ovation** platform and custom excitation to modernize *265 MW* of capacity (powering ~60,000 homes).
- The upgrade standardized controls, reduced operations and maintenance costs by *30%*, halved troubleshooting time, improved unit reliability into the *90th percentile*, and simplified spares and training.
- The unified automation improves grid reliability and *renewable* integration (including pump-storage units), positioning SRP to meet Phoenix-area growth and extreme-temperature demand.

items.title: Etching for a Greener Future: Why Energy Innovation Is Converging
How a Virtual Twin Turns Tariff Turbulence Into a Strategic Advantage for Manufacturers
The National Cyber Security Agency–State of Qatar Joins ISASecure
Case Study: Ensuring Environmental Reliability in a High-Density Data Center Expansion
Yokogawa and Kyoto Brewer Craft Bank Test Optimization of Fermentation Process with AI-Guided Temperature Setting Schedule
Automation and Digitalization to Form the Core of HANNOVER MESSE 2026
Rockwell Automation, Avvale and ESGeo Collaborate to Deliver OT-Generated Sustainability Reporting Solution
JR Automation Invests $4M+ in Forever Feed Technologies
items.summary:
- JR Automation invested over *$4,000,000* to deploy eight Forever Feed Technologies (FFT) Grow Systems, leveraging JRA/Hitachi automation to scale commercial indoor feed production.
- Each FFT Grow System can produce up to *50 tons* of sprouted grain per day using *95% less water* than field-grown alfalfa and can feed more than *2,500* animals.
- The systems can replace up to *700 acres*, cut transport emissions, improve feed-efficiency for dairy and beef operations, and advance long-term agricultural *sustainability*.

items.title: Otto Mation Comic Caption Contest: October 2025
items.author: Otto Mation
items.summary:
- *Caption* the Otto Mation comic by submitting as many entries as you like via the form for a chance to win a *prize*.
- The strip follows *Otto Mation*, an automation character tied to the *C.A.P.* (Certified Automation Professional) credential and industry humor.
- Published September 29, 2025, the post also invites readers to *subscribe* to Automation.com's newsletters for more content.

items.title: NEMA Announces 2025 Industry Award Honorees
What to Look for in Your Motion Control Feedback Device
Tosibox Rebrands as Tosi Amid Record Growth
items.summary:
- Tosibox rebranded as **Tosi**, reflecting *70% growth* in average subscription deal size, a new U.S. HQ in Irving, TX, and a doubled U.S. sales team.
- The company launched *TosiANTA* (Advanced Network Traffic Analytics), rolled out *TosiCARE* services, and showcased “Well Pad to Cloud in Five Minutes” to speed OT connectivity and security.
- Serving 800+ customers and 200+ partners, Tosi positions *TosiControl* as the fastest way to connect, protect and control *OT* networks with no service disruption from the rebrand.

items.title: End-of-Line and Warehouse Packaging Automation Market Projected to Grow by $2.4 Billion in Five Years
Mouser Electronics Celebrates Its 2025 Best-in-Class Award Winners
Global Robot Demand in Factories Doubles Over 10 Years
The Future of Process Automation: Unlocking the Power of Agentic AI
ABB Opens Hydroelectric Power Generator Line at Its Ring Motor Factory in Spain
Rockwell Automation Appoints Ahmad Haydar as Country Manager for the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
Redfish-Embedded PLCs Revolutionize Data Center Cooling
Lane Electronics to Showcase High-Performance Connector Solutions at EDS 2025
Spectrum Instrumentation Breaks Ground on New HQ
items.summary:
- Since 1989 *Spectrum Instrumentation* has grown from a small development team into a global maker of modular PC-based digitizers and NETBOX instruments used in aerospace, quantum research, medical tech, and semiconductor testing.
- To support steady growth, CEO *Gisela Hassler* laid the foundation for a state-of-the-art headquarters in Ahrensburg (near Hamburg) on Sept. 9, 2025, consolidating R&D, production, sales, and administration with space for future expansion.
- The company emphasizes *quality* with a five-year warranty and 15–20 years of parts/support, serving clients like Intel, Siemens, and CERN.

items.title: Nordson Enables Actnano PFAS-Free Coatings on ASYMTEK
items.summary:
- Nordson’s *ASYMTEK* SL-940 and SL-1040 are now fully compatible with actnano’s *PFAS‑free* Advanced nanoGUARD (*ANG*) coatings, enabling manufacturers to shift to *greener* materials without losing throughput.
- actnano’s ANG eliminates energy‑intensive curing ovens while maintaining PCBA protection, reducing energy use and improving workplace safety.
- Nordson features (agitating reservoirs, circulating fluids/applicators, extraction filters, dual ultrasonic cleaning) optimize handling and ease high‑throughput adoption.

items.title: Who's Ramping Up R&D Investment in Lithium-Ion Batteries?
items.author: Shirly Zhu
items.summary:
- The lithium-ion battery industry is experiencing *intense technology-driven competition* with leading companies like CATL investing over $2 billion annually in R&D to innovate in materials and production for *energy density*, *ultra-fast charging*, and *long cycle life*.
- Emerging enterprises such as China's CALB and COSMX are accelerating R&D spending rapidly, with growth rates above 30%, focusing on advanced materials and diverse applications including *consumer batteries* and *drones*.
- Investment priorities include *performance breakthroughs*, *application expansion* into eVTOL aircraft and robotics, and *forward-looking technologies* like solid-state and sodium-ion batteries, with increasing integration of AI and smart manufacturing to reinforce competitiveness.

items.title: LevelBlue Research Finds Rising Cyber Threats to Manufacturing Are Driving Leaders to Prioritize Cyber Resilience
Seeq Named Leader in 2025 Industrial AI Analytics
items.summary:
- *Seeq* was recognized as a **Leader** in the inaugural Verdantix *Green Quadrant for Industrial AI Analytics 2025*.
- The evaluation highlighted Seeq's strengths in data processing, user interface, optimization, and its specialized *Pharma Suite* targeted for GMP compliance.
- This award underscores Seeq's **market leadership**, innovation, and commitment to advancing **industrial manufacturing** through AI and analytics.

items.title: C3 AI Named a Leader in Industrial AI
items.summary:
*C3 AI has been named a Leader in the 2025 Industrial AI Analytics report by Verdantix.*
*The company excels in predictive maintenance, supply chain solutions, and MLOps, with top scores in capabilities and momentum.*
*Customer successes include significant cost savings for Nucor and improved grid resilience for Con Edison.*

items.title: Libiao Robotics Opens U.S. Office in New Jersey
items.summary:
*Libiao Robotics has inaugurated its U.S. office in Hillsborough, New Jersey, to better serve its expanding North American customer base.*
- The 8,500 sq ft facility includes offices, a demo area, and a dynamic mock warehouse showcasing the award-winning AirRob storage system.
- The company emphasizes its commitment to innovation, local community engagement, and the expansion of warehouse automation solutions in the U.S.*

items.title: My ISA Story: Reducing Environmental Pollution, Operating Costs With ISA Standards and Procedures
My ISA Story: Low-Cost Automation, High Impact
items.summary:
*A career grounded in practical, cost-effective automation began with a simple relay panel and a $350 PLC.*
- The author emphasizes the importance of *standards, discipline, and principles* in creating reliable automation solutions.
- Key projects included re-platforming controls for reliability, restoring legacy plants, and supporting critical infrastructure, all while mentoring new engineers and adhering to ISA standards.

items.title: My ISA Story: From Seventh Place to Scholarship
items.summary:
- *Om Mandhane* shares how his journey with ISA began as a curious student and grew into a story of growth, community, and achievement.
- Despite narrowly missing the top spot at the India Automation Games, he learned valuable lessons and built strong bonds through hands-on projects and competitions.
- Winning the ISA International Scholarship was a key milestone, inspiring Om to mentor others and carry forward ISA's legacy of support and innovation.
